Articles.Content:
i'm trying to play ksp in a window mode on 640x480 resolution but then i don't see some buttons on screen.

any solution for this?

(yes it's weird but i'm trying to play on my old pc and it's so damn weak, that's why i need such a small resolution)
You may be out of luck Cannon, KSP's minimum resolution is 1024x768, you can try forcing 640x480 in the settings.cfg but you should expect oddness such as buttons being off-screen.
